distributeFor(uint64,uint64,bytes,bytes3.details: Permissionless function to distribute rewards by providing the necessary Merkle proofs. Reverts if the proofs are invalid.

params.nextTimestamp: The timestamp of the next beacon block to distribute for. The EIP-4788 Beacon Roots contract is queried by this key, returning the parent beacon block root from the next timestamp.
params.proposerIndex: The proposer index of the beacon block. This should be the validator index corresponding to the pubkey in the validator registry in the beacon state.
params.proposerIndexProof: The Merkle proof of the proposer index in the beacon block.
params.pubkey: The validator pubkey of the proposer.
params.pubkeyProof: The Merkle proof of the validator pubkey of the proposer in the beacon block.

beraChef().notice: Returns the address of the BeraChef contract.

distributeFor(uint64,uint64,bytes,bytes3.notice: Distribute the rewards to the reward allocation receivers.

documentation.text: @notice Returns the address of the BeraChef contract.
